creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black and blue; long jacket with long sleeves; embroidered bands on either side of neck opening, trimmed with red pompons; red cloth band trim with yellow, white, black and blue stitched lines; red tassels with beads at sides and back of neck; red, gold and orange embroidery including geometricized trees and animals at bottom and cuffs
title: Woman's festival jacket
